title: Notification page during Sign Up - iOS
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user goes through the Sign up flow
AND user is on Notification page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Notification page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with

* title “Notifications” 
- picture/icon in the middle of the screen
- below the picture should be the message “MLB Play uses push notifications to notify you of available games, important updated, and your scores.”
- and there should be a clickable "Enable In Settings" and "Skip this for now" buttons

custom_steps_separated.content: If user clicks on 'Enable Notifications'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to device settings - MLB Play

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user click 'Skip for now'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to the Games tab in the app

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enables notification in device settings
custom_steps_separated.expected: WHEN user goes back to the app, user sees the copy 'Notifications are enabled. You'll be notified of available games, important updates, and your scores.'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user disables notification in device settings
custom_steps_separated.expected: WHEN user goes back to the app, user sees the copy 'Notifications are disabled. MLB Play uses push notifications to notify you of available games, important updates, and your scores.'

title: Onboarding - Push Notifications Enabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the MLB Play app installed on device 

NOTE: Android automatically enables push and does not prompt the user when the user installs the application
custom_steps:
(iOS)
WHEN user onboards and Sign up with new account 
AND user enables push notifications when prompted

(Android)
Push Notification prompt won't display and its automatically enabled
custom_expected: All notifications should be enabled for the user after onboarding once PN is enabled (Allow)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user goes through onboarding process
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with Notifications prompt

Notification Title

Icon

Notifications are disabled.
MLB Play uses push notification to notify you of available games, important updates, and your scores.

Enable In Settings CTA
Skip this for now CTA

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user Enables notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should be taken to Device Settings where user can enable the Notifications

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to  Profile -> Settings -> Notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN all notifications should be enabled for the user in device OS settings -> MLB Play

title: Notifications Settings Retained with Restart
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device 
AND user is logged in with MLB account in the app
AND user has push notifications enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN user has push notifications enabled
AND User restart the device
custom_expected: THEN all changes should be saved between restarts for the Push Notifications

custom_steps_separated.expected: AND there should be no issue with Notification selection after restarts

title: Notifications Settings Retained after Logout
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device 
AND user is logged out of the app
AND user has enabled push notifications
custom_steps: WHEN user log Out and Log back in
custom_expected: THEN Notifications should be preserved after logout/login

title: Enable/disable notification on Android
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user is on profile page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Setting Menu -> Notifications
custom_expected:
THEN user is brought to the App Notification page (phone settings)
AND user is able to turn notifications on/off

title: Enable/disable notification on iOS
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user is on profile page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Setting Menu -> Notifications
custom_expected:
THEN user is brought to the MLB Play (phone settings) where user can click on notifications
AND user is able to turn notifications on/off

title: iOS - Push Notification Deep-Linking
custom_preconds: GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is logged in 
AND user is on the app on any page besides the gameloop
AND user receives a game specific push notification (ex “Your streak is now 9 (+1) | Eloy Jimenez got a hit!)
AND user clicks on the PN
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to the specific game loop (ex Beat the Streak game)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is logged in 
AND MLB Play app is back grounded
AND user receives a game specific push notification (ex “Your streak is now 9 (+1) | Eloy Jimenez got a hit!)
AND user clicks on the PN
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to the specific game loop (ex Beat the Streak game)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is logged out 
AND user receives a game specific push notification (ex “Your streak is now 9 (+1) | Eloy Jimenez got a hit!)
AND user clicks on the PN
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is taken to the sign in page 
AND after user signs in, user is taken to the specific game loop (ex Beat the Streak game)

title: EOG PN for Beat the Streak
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user has notifications on

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user played the Beat the Streak 
AND the game is final
AND MLB Play app is exited or backgrounded
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should receive a push notification (only once per each game and not the contest)
AND the notification contest should be randomly picked from the document 
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1oAVua_nZlopAzWljnOQAcAoWGljhdvf9dy45cKE2qIA/edit

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on PN
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to Results tab in the app

title: EOG PN for Base Chase
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user has notifications on

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user played the Base Chase
AND the game is final
AND MLB Play app is exited or backgrounded
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should receive a push notification (only once per each game and not the contest)
AND the headline should say: Base Chase Result
AND the body should say:  Your Base Chase team earned # total bases
If the team only earned 1 base then the copy should read: Your Base Chase team earned 1 total base

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on PN
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to Results tab in the app

title: EOG PN for Bingo
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user logged in to the app
AND user has notifications on

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user played the Base Chase
AND the game is final
AND MLB Play app is exited or backgrounded
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should receive a push notification (only once per each game and not the contest)
AND the headline should say 'Bingo Result'
AND the body should say:  

- The copy should read: Your Bingo card had # correct tiles
If Bingo card had only one correct tile then the copy should read: Your Bingo card had 1 correct tile

If the user got Single Bingo, Diamond, or Blackout then the copy should read: Your Bingo card had # correct tiles and you got [Single Bingo/Diamond/Blackout].

AND the copy should select the highest achievement of three that the user earned. (Single rule only)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on PN
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought to Results tab in the app
